Package cycling

Class Stage

java.lang.Object
cycling.Stage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Stage extends Object implements Serializable
Stage- A class which stores information about stages and handles some of the operations related to stages.

  • Constructor Details

    • Stage

      public Stage(int stageId, int raceId, String stageName, String description, double length, LocalDateTime startTime, StageType type)
      Constructor for the Objects of Stage Class
      Parameters:
      stageId - the Id of the stage
      raceId - the Id of the race
      stageName - An identifier name for the stage.
      description - A descriptive text for the stage.
      length - Stage length in kilometres.
      startTime - The date and time in which the stage will be raced. It cannot be null.
      type - The type of the stage. This is used to determine the amount of points given to the winner.
